faq.question: What time should I arrive for the wedding?
faq.answer: Please arrive by 5pm to ensure there aren't any interruptions during the ceremony that begins prompty at 5:30pm. New York City traffic can be unpredictable, so plan accordingly. Check the Events page for directions to the Boathouse.

faq.question: Is there a hotel room block?
faq.answer: Yes! We have 3 room block options. Each guest is responsible for their respective guest room(s). Please view the room blocks on the Travel page.

faq.question: What do I wear?
faq.answer:
The attire for the wedding is Black-Tie Optional: tuxedos are welcome but not required. Suits with ties, long dresses & gowns, and upscale pantsuits are perfect. Please avoid white. The flooring is herringbone brick, so thinner heels might be tricky.

The welcome drinks attire is Elevated Smart Casual. Dressy but relaxed! Think trousers or chinos with a nice shirt or sweater, and stylish dresses, skirts, or polished pants. Jackets and ties are not required. Please no jeans or athletic shoes. Examples and optional color palette of the attire can be found on the Attire page.

faq.question: What will the weather be like?

faq.question: What's the phone and photo policy?
faq.answer: We kindly ask that you keep your phones away and refrain from taking photos during the ceremony. Feel free to use your phone during cocktail hour and the reception!

faq.question: Can I bring a plus one?
faq.answer: It will be indicated on your RSVP if you have a plus one. Please reach out if you have any questions!

faq.question: Can I bring my children?
faq.answer: To ensure a relaxed and enjoyable celebration for everyone, we kindly ask that only the children that we have specifically invited attend. The amount of invited children is less than a handful. We appreciate your understanding!

faq.question: What food and drink will be provided?
faq.answer: At the wedding, there is a cocktail hour with hors d'oeuvres and a plated dinner. There is an open bar at both the wedding and the welcome drinks event. ðŸ¥‚ You will select your entree for the wedding reception when you RSVP. Please let us know if you have any dietary restrictions.
